forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
The morning dawns in Downtown San Francisco, bringing with it a pleasant mix of sunshine and gentle breezes. The city is waking up under a clear sky, the sun casting a warm yet soft glow that beckons for exploration. With temperatures climbing towards a comfortable 66 degrees, the hints of a typical San Francisco day emerge—where sunlight dances across the waterfront and the wind carries the fresh scent of the ocean. The breezy conditions, with west-southwest winds at 6 to 15 mph, add a refreshing touch, making a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a visit to one of the nearby parks a perfect venture.

Tonight, the sky will continue to grant its clear favor, offering a lullaby of serenity with temperatures settling around 56 degrees. Comfortable layers will serve well; perhaps a light jacket paired with a cozy scarf to embrace the evening's gentle chill. Plan to sip a warm cup of coffee at your favorite café, or perhaps a quiet stroll with friends to bask in the aftermath of a sun-kissed day. While fog may drift lazily along the fringes of the bay, it’s a day that rewards those seeking clarity and warmth amidst the vibrant life of the city.
